author: El Laggron
description: A buch of utility and quality cogs that brings unique features for your server. Made by Laggron.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the repository! Please check the wiki for all informations about the cogs.
https://laggrons-dumb-cogs.readthedocs.io/
Join the official discord server for questions or suggestions.
https://discord.gg/AVzjfpR

**Important**
Some cogs use Sentry error reporting, like core Red. If Sentry is enabled on Red, it will also be enabled with these cogs.
